text: aur jab ye log logon ko masjidul haraam (khaan e kaaba kee ibaadat) se rokate hai to phir unake lie kaun see baat baaqee hai ki un par azaab na naazil kare aur ye log to khaanae kaaba ke mutavallee bhee nahin (phir kyon rokate hai) isake mutavallee to sirph parahezagaar log hain magar in kaafiron mein se bahutere nahin jaanate
